definitions: in a way that is regarded by society to be good, proper, or correct

examples.text: his boss insists that all his staff be respectably married

shortDefinitions: in way that is regarded by society to be good, proper, or correct

definitions: in a way that is regarded as decent or presentable

examples.text: she was rather respectably dressed for the occasion

shortDefinitions: in way that is regarded as decent or presentable

definitions: to an adequate or acceptable standard

examples.text: he played respectably this season, but he was not quite the elite quarterback we envisioned
despite little preparation, he performed respectably well
